title: Space Ambient Background - Volume 1
description: A collection of 10 space ambient themes with evocative and deep sonic textures.
longDescription:
Preview on

  • YouTube


FREQUENTLY ASKED MUSIC presents SPACE AMBIENT BACKGROUND.

A collection of 10 space ambient themes with evocative and deep sonic textures, ideal for your games related to space, exploration and meditation.

The package includes multiple loops, edit versions for all your editing needs.


  • Chants From Orion Full length (02:41), 10 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Cosmic Meditation Full length (03:55), 6 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Discovering Comets Full length (02:56), 7 Loops, 1 Edits
  • Heart Of Pluto Full length (03:05), 9 Loops, 3 Edits
  • In The Arms Of Venus Full length (05:32), 10 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Jupiter Sleeps Full length (02:13), 8 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Moon Explorations Full length (02:30), 10 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Romance On Pluto Full length (03:15), 6 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Route To Mars Full length (03:15), 7 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Victoria Crater Full length (04:14), 7 Loops, 3 Edits


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Sci-Fi - Volume 1

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 10 Full length tracks
  • 24 Edits
  • 80 Loops


Number of Audio Wavs: 114

Number of Audio Cues: 114

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1h, 58m, 49s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


﻿- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
